resources.string: The fraction is used to represent the parts that are taken from an object (Numerator) that has been divided into equal parts (Denominator) and is represented as follows:
For example, we divide a pizza into 8 equal parts and take three.
ADD FRACTIONS WITH THE SAME DENOMINATOR (HOMOGENEOUS)
Debemos sumar sus numeradores y dejar su denominador igual
The cross product of numerator by denominator must be added to obtain the numerator result, while for the denominator result is the multiplication of denominators
SUBTRACT FRACTIONS WITH THE SAME DENOMINATOR (HOMOGENEOUS)
We must subtract their numerators and leave their denominator equal
The cross product of numerator by denominator must be subtracted to obtain the numerator result, while for the denominator result is the multiplication of the denominators
We just have to multiply numerators and denominators
For this we must multiply numerator by denominator
